cause.description:
This cause is to find my Brother In-Law Cesar a Hot Babe. Will accept a one night stand or long term relationship, which ever can be fit into your schedule. He's easy on the eyes, makes good scrambled eggs and TTC accessible. Hurry up Ladies he will be snacthed up quickly.
1. Cesar needs a Sexy Babe!
2. Money raised will be for first date
3. Cesar needs a SEXY Babe!!!
cause.mission: To Find Cesar a girl and raise money for their first date.
cause.name: Find My Brother In-Law a Girl
